content: I know someone who'd like to host a "{Group/Cause} Investors for Harris" call or potentially an IRL fundraiser. How do I make that connection?
I would encourage them to join our Discord and then they can engage with our Hosts team to get the support for this event.
I'm associated with the org, could I speak with the Hosts team to get a better picture of what the setup would look like?
And thank you for the prompt response!
You can do this by going to "Channels & Roles"' then select "host an event" this will give you access to the Hosts team.
